patterns: What are the documents required during admission
responses:
The applicant needs to provide the following materials:
• Character certificates, mark sheets, and transcripts for SLC, ISC, 10+2, I.E., A Level, and CBSE
• One picture of each parent or guardian and two passport-sized images of the student.
• A duplicate of their passport
• Migration certificate; • 200-marks math certificate for applicants in the biological or physical group.
• The original score card from IOE, Pulchowk, must to be turned in when applying for admission.
In order to participate in the IOE final test, students must maintain a minimum of 75% attendance.

patterns: when does a students becomes disqualified
responses:
A student will be subject to disqualification if they: • Don't keep up a minimum of 75% attendance for the entire semester.
• The student fails to pass the tests that are given over the semester. The subject teacher in question must make the recommendation for disqualification.
While on college property, students must always have the identity card that was issued to them.

patterns: what is the uniform of kec
responses:
The following is the required student attire:
The college-mandated tie, black shoes, a white shirt, and a navy blue coat, jacket, or coat
Er. Sudeep Shakya is the HOD of computer faculty.
Ar. Moon Singh Dongol is the HOD of architecture faculty.
Er. Rajan Lama is the HOD of electronics faculty.
Er. Binod Bhandari is the HOD of electrical faculty.

Er. Arjun Poudel is the HOD of civil faculty.

patterns: what are the clubs present in kathmandu engineering college?
how many clubs are present in kathmandu engineering college
Are there any club in kec
responses: KEC has the following clubs: Kec Electrical Club, Robotics Club, Electronics Project Club (EPC), AKAR (Association Of KEC Architecture), KEC IT Club,CESA-KEC, and KEC Yoga Club.

KEC Electrical Club is for electrical engineering students who want to learn more about the field.Workshops, software simulation trainings, lecture programs, and the printing of the annual journal SYNERGY are among the activities organized by the club.

Kathmandu Engineering College's (KEC) Robotics Club is a student-run club created by active and enthusiastic seniors who are passionate about robotics. Robotics Club has been a forerunner in introducing robotics knowledge and technology to KEC.

Electronics Project Club (EPC) is an open platform for students and electronic Kathmandu Engineering College,. The club's purpose is to provide initial training for working with electronic equipment, specifications on hardware/software design and maintenance, and workshops on Embedded System Design, Automation, and Autonomous Robotics.

AKAR is known for its active commitment and participation in a range of educational and non-academic campaigns. AKAR offers an environment for students' creative ideas to grow into a reality. AKAR provides an opportunity for students to expose and improve their creativity through exhibitions, workshops, and challenges.

KEC IT Club is a student group that provides students with the opportunity to learn on the latest technology in the computer company. The major goal of this club is to share ideas in the IT field and inspiring collaboration, allowing students understand the potential and future of the software industry as a whole.

Civil Engineering Student Association (CESA) is a non-profit, non-political association of Civil Engineering students at KEC.CESA is open to any civil engineering student.Students that support CESA can also become members.
An essential component of KEC is yoga.KEC conducts a number of programs on how to improve your personality and develop life skills through yoga and meditation.

patterns: Is there a boy hostel in Kec?
Does Kec have a boy hostel?
responses: KEC has a modern boys hostel on its premises. With a warden, guards, and service staff, it has a strong security system.

patterns: Is there girls hostel in Kec?
Does Kec have a girls hostel?
responses: There is a girls' hostel at KEC. The hostel is an excellent place to study and focus because of its wonderful atmosphere. Complete with a warden, guard, and service staff, it has an outstanding security system.

patterns: do we have to do project in every semester
is there project also in syllabus
responses: Project is listed under IOE syllabus named as minor and major for some faculties and only major for other,Please ask about respective faculty

patterns: how many projects should we do in computer
how many projects should we submit to the computer department
responses: We have two projects in the computer faculty: minor projects and major projects.The fifth and sixth semesters have been utilized for minor projects, and the seventh and eighth semesters have been utilized for major projects.

patterns: how many projects should we do in electronics
how many projects should we submit to the electronics department
responses: We have two projects in the electronics faculty: minor projects and major projects.The fifth and sixth semesters have been utilized for minor projects, and the seventh and eighth semesters have been utilized for major projects.

patterns: how many projects should we do in electrical
how many projects should we submit to the electrical department
responses: We have one project in the electrical faculty:major project.The the seventh and eighth semesters have been utilized for major projects.

patterns: how many projects should we do in civil
how many projects should we submit to the civil department
responses: We have one project in the civil faculty:major project.The the seventh and eighth semesters have been utilized for major projects.

patterns: how many defense do we have in one project
how many defense in taken for one project
responses: We have proposal defense, mid-term defense, pre-final defense, and final defense taken at specific intervals in between project.

patterns: Are there any one who help with project
should the project be done all alone
responses: Every project group has a supervisor assigned to it so that students can more easily communicate any issues or confusion they may be having with their project.

patterns: What is the time frame for defense presentation
responses: The defense presentation will take ten minutes in total.

patterns: what is the total marks carried by project
responses: For a project, the full marks is 75.

patterns: what is the total marks given by internal
internal marks by teacher for project
responses: For a project, the college gets a total of 50 marks

patterns: what is the total marks given by external
externall marks by teacher for project
responses: For a project, the externak gives a total of 25 marks

patterns: what is the full marks and pass marks for adt
adt full marks and pass marks
responses: Full Marks for an assesment is 20 and Pass marks for an assesment is 8.

patterns: what is the full marks and pass marks for assesment
assesment full marks and pass marks
responses: Full Marks for an assesment is 50 and Pass marks for an assesment is 20.

patterns: In which class we should give adt
where is my class in adt
responses: Before the actual date, notice of the class arrangement for that particular adt will be released, indicating where we must go based on our roll number for that particular class.

patterns: how many adt do we have to give in total in one sem
how many adt is there in one sem
responses: In a semester, college administers two adt and one final assessment for internal grades.

patterns: what happens if a person fails in all adt
what happens if a student doesnot pass in any adt
responses: A student will not be qualified to sit for the IOE board exam if they receive failing grades on all of the exams administered by college for internal marks.

patterns: what is the total internal marks for theory
total internal marks of a subject
responses: A student must receive a passing score of 8 out of 20 internal marks in order to be eligible for the boards exam.
The college is open from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm, Monday through Friday.
Although a class period lasts 45 minutes, an hour and forty-five minutes are often dedicated to a particular subject.

patterns: how many minutes breaktime is given
responses: Students get access to the forty-minute break.
